

## Example of  parent
```
    {
      "id": 1,
      "uuid": "413e8630-c16c-11e5-b8c9-9b7d37852114",
      "name": "string",
      "count": 1,
      "category": "CAT1 | CAT2",
      "birthday": "2015-12-31T23:59:59.123",
      "createdAt": "2015-12-31T23:59:59.123",
      "updatedAt": "2015-12-31T23:59:59.123",
      "parentDetailsId": 1,
      "children": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "string",
          "createdAt": "2015-12-31T23:59:59.123",
          "updatedAt": "2015-12-31T23:59:59.123",
          "parentId": 1,
          "grandchildren": [
            {
              "id": 1,
              "name": "string",
              "createdAt": "2015-12-31T23:59:59.123",
              "updatedAt": "2015-12-31T23:59:59.123",
              "parentId": 1,
              "grandParentId": 1,
              "childId": 1,
              "parent": {}
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "parentDetail": {
        "id": 1,
        "address": "string",
        "createdAt": "2015-12-31T23:59:59.123",
        "updatedAt": "2015-12-31T23:59:59.123",
        "parentId": 1
      }
    }
```
